name: panchangshravan
0:
”Alexa open lunar assistant for Sunday in Mysore”
”Alexa open lunar assistant and tell me about lunar calendar in London on Tuesday”
”Alexa open lunar assistant and tell me about lunar calendar in Boston on Monday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunar assistant
des: Ask for the lunar day by specifying a date and place. You get to know the lunar day and the time until it lasts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
